articles.title: Beating Barcelona takes Man United’s Ten Hag transformation to another level - Malay Mail
articles.description: MANCHESTER, Feb 24 — Erik ten Hag’s transformation of Manchester United now has a European scalp to get excited about as Barcelona were vanquished on a night the Red Devils...
